scripts.schema: duckdb ../../db/duck.db "COPY ( SELECT sql FROM ( SELECT 1 AS ord, sql, table_name AS name FROM duckdb_tables() WHERE schema_name NOT IN ('information_schema','pg_catalog') AND NOT temporary AND name NOT LIKE 'duckdb_%' AND name NOT LIKE 'sqlite_%' UNION ALL SELECT 2, sql, view_name FROM duckdb_views() WHERE schema_name NOT IN ('information_schema','pg_catalog') AND NOT temporary AND view_name NOT LIKE 'duckdb_%' AND view_name NOT LIKE 'sqlite_%' UNION ALL SELECT 3, sql, sequence_name FROM duckdb_sequences() WHERE schema_name NOT IN ('information_schema','pg_catalog') UNION ALL SELECT 4, sql, index_name FROM duckdb_indexes() WHERE schema_name NOT IN ('information_schema','pg_catalog') ) t ORDER BY ord, name ) TO 'schema.sql';" > schema.sql
